data.name: Boston Lockdown Campaign Book pdf
data.detailed_description:
This adds the cool Boston Lockdown Campaign book (240 pages) with heaps of background intel, stories and adventures as pdf to your Shadowrun Deluxe or Standard edition!
You can find your extra downloads in your Steam Folder under Shadowrun Chronicles.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ShadowrunChronicles\Extras
data.about_the_game:
This adds the cool Boston Lockdown Campaign book (240 pages) with heaps of background intel, stories and adventures as pdf to your Shadowrun Deluxe or Standard edition!
You can find your extra downloads in your Steam Folder under Shadowrun Chronicles.
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\ShadowrunChronicles\Extras
data.short_description: This adds the cool Boston Lockdown Campaign book (240 pages) with heaps of background intel, stories and adventures as pdf to your Deluxe or Standard Edition!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any, it is a pdf
  • Graphics: 1024 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is a pdf downloaded to your Games folder under Steam
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any, it is a pdf
  • Graphics: 2048 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is a pdf downloaded to your Games folder under Steam
